00028 void ComponentInstanceModel::setComponent( ComponentItem* component ) {
00029 
00030         Q_ASSERT(component);
00031 
00032         // if there is previously selected component
00033         if (component_) {
00034                 component_->disconnect(this);
00035         }
00036 
00037         component_ = component;
00038 
00039     // get the edit provider that manages the undo/redo stack
00040     // TODO: Base class for the diagrams!
00041     if (dynamic_cast<BlockDiagram*>(component->scene()) != 0)
00042     {
00043         BlockDiagram* diagram = static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(component->scene());
00044         DesignWidget* designWidget = diagram->parent();
00045         editProvider_ = designWidget->getGenericEditProvider();
00046     }
00047     else
00048     {
00049         EndpointDesignDiagram* diagram = static_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(component->scene());
00050         editProvider_ = diagram->parent()->getGenericEditProvider();
00051     }
00052         
00053         values_ = component->getConfigurableElements();
00054         readValues();
00055 
00056         connect(component_, SIGNAL(confElementsChanged(const QMap<QString, QString>&)),
00057                 this, SLOT(changeElements(const QMap<QString, QString>&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00058 
00059         // if the connected component is destroyed then clear this editor
00060         connect(component_, SIGNAL(destroyed(ComponentItem*)),
00061                     this, SLOT(clear()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00062 }
00063 
00064 void ComponentInstanceModel::clear() {
00065 
00066         // if previous component has been specified
00067         if (component_) {
00068                 // disconnect the component's signals
00069                 component_->disconnect(this);
00070         }
00071 
00072         component_ = 0;
00073         values_.clear();
00074 
00075         beginResetModel();
00076         table_.clear();
00077         endResetModel();
00078 }

00080 int ComponentInstanceModel::rowCount( const QModelIndex& parent /*= QModelIndex()*/ ) const {
00081         if (parent.isValid())
00082                 return 0;
00083         return table_.size();

00088                 return 0;
00089         return 2;

00092 QVariant ComponentInstanceModel::data( const QModelIndex& index, 
00093                                                                           int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole*/ ) const {
00094 
00095         if (!index.isValid())
00096                 return QVariant();
00097         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00098                 return QVariant();
00099 
00100         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00101                 switch (index.column()) {
00102                         case 0:
00103                                 return table_.at(index.row()).name_;
00104                         case 1:
00105                                 return table_.at(index.row()).value_;
00106                         default:
00107                                 return QVariant();
00108                 }
00109         }
00110         else 
00111                 return QVariant();
00112 }

00114 QVariant ComponentInstanceModel::headerData( int section,
00115                                                                                         Qt::Orientation orientation, 
00116                                                                                         int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const {
00117                                                                 
00118         if (orientation != Qt::Horizontal)
00119                 return QVariant();
00120 
00121         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00122                 switch (section) {
00123                         case 0:
00124                                 return tr("Name");
00125                         case 1:
00126                                 return tr("Value");
00127                         default:
00128                                 return QVariant();
00129                 }
00130         }
00131         else
00132                 return QVariant();
00133 }
00134 
00135 bool ComponentInstanceModel::setData( const QModelIndex& index,
00136                                                                          const QVariant& value, 
00137                                                                          int role /*= Qt::EditRole */ ) {
00138 
00139         if (!index.isValid())
00140                 return false;
00141         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00142                 return false;
00143 
00144         if (role == Qt::EditRole) {
00145                 switch (index.column()) {
00146                         case 0: {
00147                                 table_[index.row()].name_ = value.toString();
00148                                 break;
00149                                         }
00150                         case 1: {
00151                                 table_[index.row()].value_ = value.toString();
00152                                 break;
00153                                         }
00154                         default:
00155                                 return false;
00156                 }
00157                 save();
00158                 emit dataChanged(index, index);
00159                 emit contentChanged();
00160                 return true;
00161         }
00162         else
00163                 return false;
00164 }

00166 Qt::ItemFlags ComponentInstanceModel::flags( const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00167 
00168         if (!index.isValid())
00169                 return Qt::NoItemFlags;
00170         return Qt::ItemIsSelectable | Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsEditable;
00171 }

00173 void ComponentInstanceModel::save() {
00174 
00175         // create the map that contains the new values.
00176         QMap<QString, QString> newValues;
00177         for (int i = 0; i < table_.size(); ++i) {
00178                 newValues.insert(table_.at(i).name_, table_.at(i).value_);
00179         }
00180 
00181         QSharedPointer<ComponentConfElementChangeCommand> cmd(new ComponentConfElementChangeCommand(component_,
00182                 newValues));
00183 
00184         // disconnect the signal to avoid infinite loops of changes.
00185         disconnect(component_, SIGNAL(confElementsChanged(const QMap<QString, QString>&)),
00186                 this, SLOT(changeElements(const QMap<QString, QString>&)));
00187         editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00188         connect(component_, SIGNAL(confElementsChanged(const QMap<QString, QString>&)),
00189                 this, SLOT(changeElements(const QMap<QString, QString>&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00190 
00191         // update the current data structure.
00192         values_ = newValues;
00193 }
00194 
00195 void ComponentInstanceModel::onAdd() {
00196         ComponentInstanceModel::ConfigurableElement element(QString(""), QString(""));
00197         if (!table_.contains(element)) {
00198                 beginInsertRows(QModelIndex(), table_.size(), table_.size());
00199                 table_.append(element);
00200                 endInsertRows();
00201                 emit contentChanged();
00202         }
00203 }
00204 
00205 void ComponentInstanceModel::onRemove( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00206 
00207         if (!index.isValid())
00208                 return;
00209 
00210         // remove the indexed configurable element
00211         beginRemoveRows(QModelIndex(), index.row(), index.row());
00212         table_.removeAt(index.row());
00213         endRemoveRows();
00214         
00215         // save the changes to the diagram component
00216         save();
00217 
00218         emit contentChanged();
00219 }
00220 
00221 void ComponentInstanceModel::changeElements( const QMap<QString, QString>& confElements ) {
00222         values_ = confElements;
00223         readValues();
00224 }
00225 
00226 void ComponentInstanceModel::readValues() {
00227         beginResetModel();
00228 
00229         // remove the items after the previous component instance
00230         table_.clear();
00231 
00232         // insert items from this component instance
00233         for (QMap<QString, QString>::iterator i = values_.begin();
00234                 i != values_.end(); ++i) {
00235                         table_.append(ConfigurableElement(i.key(), i.value()));
00236         }
00237         endResetModel();
00238 }

00253 bool ComponentInstanceModel::ConfigurableElement::operator==( 
00254         const ConfigurableElement& other ) const {
00255         return name_ == other.name_;
